name: MagnetSweep
description:
MagnetSweep is a score-attack arcade game where you defend your computer's data from a relentless virus attack! You control a powerful magnet that allows you to erase the viruses and build your defense. Play for free!

Features:

  • Box2d physics
  • Box2dlights lighting (dynamic 2d lights)
  • 3 power-ups
  • High score system
  • Build your shield

Check out the MagnetSweep development blog
